remarks: Define the divides relation. ` M || N ` means ` M ` divides into ` N ` with no remainder.  For example, ` 3 || 6 ` ( ~ ex-dvds ).  As proven in ~ dvdsval3 , ` M || N <-> ( N mod M ) = 0 ` .  See ~ divides and ~ dvdsval2 for other equivalent expressions.  (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 21-Mar-2011.)
